argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | clatlem.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | clatlem.u | |- U = ( lub ` K ) |
| 3 |  | clatlem.g | |- G = ( glb ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( K e. CLat /\ S C_ B ) -> K e. CLat ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` K ) e. _V |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_eqeltri | |- B e. _V |
| 7 | 6 | #P_elpw2 | |- ( S e. ~P B <-> S C_ B ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_biimpri | |- ( S C_ B -> S e. ~P B ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( K e. CLat /\ S C_ B ) -> S e. ~P B ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_isclat | |- ( K e. CLat <-> ( K e. Poset /\ ( dom U = ~P B /\ dom G = ~P B ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_biimpi | |- ( K e. CLat -> ( K e. Poset /\ ( dom U = ~P B /\ dom G = ~P B ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( K e. CLat /\ S C_ B ) -> ( K e. Poset /\ ( dom U = ~P B /\ dom G = ~P B ) ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( dom U = ~P B /\ dom G = ~P B ) -> dom U = ~P B ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( K e. Poset /\ ( dom U = ~P B /\ dom G = ~P B ) ) -> dom U = ~P B ) |
| 15 | 12, 14 | #P_syl | |- ( ( K e. CLat /\ S C_ B ) -> dom U = ~P B ) |
| 16 | 9, 15 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ( K e. CLat /\ S C_ B ) -> S e. dom U ) |
| 17 | 1, 2, 4, 16 | #P_lubcl | |- ( ( K e. CLat /\ S C_ B ) -> ( U ` S ) e. B ) |
| 18 | 12 | #P_simprrd | |- ( ( K e. CLat /\ S C_ B ) -> dom G = ~P B ) |
| 19 | 9, 18 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ( K e. CLat /\ S C_ B ) -> S e. dom G ) |
| 20 | 1, 3, 4, 19 | #P_glbcl | |- ( ( K e. CLat /\ S C_ B ) -> ( G ` S ) e. B ) |
| 21 | 17, 20 | #P_jca | |- ( ( K e. CLat /\ S C_ B ) -> ( ( U ` S ) e. B /\ ( G ` S ) e. B ) ) |
